import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Header.css';// Import the CSS file
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=_ref=>{let{user}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const openProfilePage=()=>{if(user==='student'){navigate('/profile/student');}else if(user==='coordinator'){navigate('/profile/coordinator');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/favicon.png",alt:"College Logo",className:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"college-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"college-name",children:"SHRI VISHNU ENGINEERING COLLEGE FOR WOMEN(Autonomous)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"college-location",children:"Vishnupur, Bhimavaram, Andhra Pradesh 534202"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:openProfilePage,className:"profile-button",children:"Profile"})]});};export default Header;
